name: Time Bomb Trouble
description:
Oops! I accidentally set off the time bomb again. Don’t worry, I’ll just defuse it! It shouldn’t be that hard.

Play here if it lags:

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/761256890/

Credits:

All art and music by me.

All code by me except a bit from this tutorial:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D16hTnDGweo

Clock ticking sfx:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yeJWiQP-Vl

Bomb sfx:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dxWkMJHc1HU

All other sfx generated at this website:

https://sfxr.me/
